Commentary.ab: Y19.7a apa.raōδaiiete] sec. cod.; Geldner, Kellens aparaōδaiiete.

Y19.7b paṇgtaŋhum] cod. vv. ll. with -ṇgt-, -ŋt- and Ind. -ṇgat-. -ṇgt- as lectio difficilior while -ṇgat- should go back to older -ṇgt- and -ŋt- should be a secondary development. Cf. attestations VS6.32, VS6.35, VS16.2. On ending -um, vid. Cantera, 2016b.
Y19.7c pairi...tanauua] likely old 1st. sg. pres. subj. act. form. Vid. Kellens, 1974 p. 164 and Kellens, 2010 p. 31.
